00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           CHECK_TABLE
00004 !
00005 !  Do some quick checks on the tree structure 
00006 
00007 !   
00008 !
00009 ! ===========================================
00010 
00011 subroutine check_table(callpoint)
00012 
00013   use treevars
00014 
00015   implicit none
00016   character*20 :: callpoint
00017   integer :: nleaf_check, ntwig_check, nleaf_me_check, ntwig_me_check
00018 
00019 
00020   ntwig_check = count(mask =  htable%node <0 )
00021   nleaf_check = count(mask =  htable%node >0 )
00022   nleaf_me_check = count(mask = htable%owner==me .and. htable%node >0 )
00023   ntwig_me_check = count(mask = htable%owner==me .and. htable%node <0 )
00024 
00025 
00026   if (nleaf /= nleaf_check) then
00027      write(*,'(3a,i4)') 'Table check called ',callpoint,' by PE',me
00028      write(*,*) '# leaves in table = ',nleaf_check,'vs ',nleaf,'accumulated'
00029      write(*,*) 'Fixing and continuing for now..'
00030 !     nleaf = nleaf_check
00031   endif
00032   if (ntwig /= ntwig_check) then
00033      write(*,'(3a,i4)') 'Table check called ',callpoint,' by PE',me
00034      write(*,*) ' # twigs in table = ',ntwig_check,'vs ',ntwig,'accumulated'
00035      write(*,*) 'Fixing and continuing for now..'
00036 !     ntwig = ntwig_check
00037   endif
00038 
00039   if (nleaf_me /= nleaf_me_check) then
00040      write(*,'(3a,i4)') 'Table check called ',callpoint,' by PE',me
00041      write(*,*) ' # own leaves in table = ',nleaf_me_check,'vs ',nleaf_me,'accumulated'
00042      write(*,*) 'Fixing and continuing for now..'
00043      nleaf_me = nleaf_me_check
00044   endif
00045   if (ntwig_me /= ntwig_me_check) then
00046      write(*,'(3a,i4)') 'Table check called ',callpoint,' by PE',me
00047      write(*,*) ' # own twigs in table = ',ntwig_me_check,'vs ',ntwig_me,'accumulated'
00048      write(*,*) 'Fixing and continuing for now..'
00049      ntwig_me = ntwig_me_check
00050   endif
00051 
00052 end subroutine check_table
